contentheadline.headline: MTV Video Music Award for Best Long Form Video

contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} The '''MTV Video Music Award for Best Long Form Video''' was given out only in 1991. {| class="wikitable" ! Year !! Winner !! Other nominees |- |{{Mtvvma|1991}} |[[Madonna (entertainer)|Madonna]] — ''[[The Immaculate Collection (video)|The Immaculate Collection]]'' |<small> * [[Aerosmith]] — ''[[Things That Go Pump in the Night]]'' * [[Peter Gabriel]] — ''P.O.V.'' * [[R.E.M.]] — ''[[Tourfilm]]''</small> |} {{MTV Video Music Awards}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Mtv Video Music Award For Best Long Form Video}} [[Category:MTV Video Music Awards]]
